resources.string:
As a dynamic professional motivated by an interest in technology and problem solving, I am seeking new challenges in Android development.


With experience working with international clients, I have successfully collaborated with multi-cultural teams, communicating with adaptability and with a focus on teamwork.


My continuous willingness to learn new things and my aptitude for programming led me to study Kotlin and Java, database manipulation, API handling, dependency injection, testing and AOSP-related knowledge.


Knowledge that I want to put into practice after my career transition as a mobile developer
